jabber.PersonalEventListener

type
class
available in

XEP-0163: Personal Eventing Protocol
Listener for incoming personal events from other entities.

Constructor

new(stream : Stream)

Instance Variables

stream(default,null) : Stream

Optional to collect ALL personal events

Instance Methods

add(t : Class<xmpp.PersonalEvent>, handler : xmpp.Message -> Xml -> Void) : Bool

Add listener for the given type.

clear() : Void

Clear all listeners.

getListener(type : Class<xmpp.PersonalEvent>) : jabber._PersonalEventListener.Listener

Returns the listeners for the given type.

iterator() : Iterator<jabber._PersonalEventListener.Listener>

remove(type : Class<xmpp.PersonalEvent>) : Bool

Remove listener for the given type.
